name: Space Survivors Shooter
description: Hello Space Survivors, this is little shooter game. Which is now most about shooting zombies put pvp will hopefully follow.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Pentium G860 3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core I3 2nd gen Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: RX480 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 16 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
